abstract: Generates dragging image components with the specified frame in the view.

declaration.code: @MainActor func draggingImageComponents(withFrame frame: NSRect, in view: NSView) -> [NSDraggingImageComponent]

overview:
## Return Value

An array of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingImageComponent] objects representing the cell.

## Discussion

The default implementation generates an image from the cell and return two components: one for [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingItem/ImageComponentKey/label] and another for [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingItem/ImageComponentKey/icon]. This is done by capturing the portion from the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell/titleRect(forBounds:)] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell/imageRect(forBounds:)] methods respectively.

This method can be subclassed and overridden to provide a custom set of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingImageComponent] to create the drag image for the cell. This method is generally used by NSTableView/NSOutlineView.

# draggingImageComponents(withFrame:in:)

**Instance Method**

Generates dragging image components with the specified frame in the view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func draggingImageComponents(withFrame frame: NSRect, in view: NSView) -> [NSDraggingImageComponent]
```

## Parameters

- **frame**: The bounding rectangle of the receiver.
- **view**: The view that manages the cell.

## Return Value

An array of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingImageComponent] objects representing the cell.

## Discussion

The default implementation generates an image from the cell and return two components: one for [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingItem/ImageComponentKey/label] and another for [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingItem/ImageComponentKey/icon]. This is done by capturing the portion from the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell/titleRect(forBounds:)] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell/imageRect(forBounds:)] methods respectively.

This method can be subclassed and overridden to provide a custom set of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingImageComponent] to create the drag image for the cell. This method is generally used by NSTableView/NSOutlineView.
title: draggingImageComponents(withFrame:in:)
